GSD.description:
PCI: Fix pci_device_is_present() for VFs by checking PF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit 81565e51ccaf6fff8910e997ee22e16b5e1dabc3. For more details please see the references link.
